value_claims.claim_title: Brisbane Catholic Education saves 9.3 hours per week per educator with Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Educators using Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio to develop a generative AI tool for integrating Catholic traditions and values into the classroom reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.source_quote: Brisbane Catholic Education equips Microsoft 365 Copilot and utilizes Microsoft Copilot Studio to develop a generative AI tool that helps integrate Catholic traditions and values into the classroom. Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time savings are directly attributed to using Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio for developing the generative AI tool.

value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projects 35,000 work hours saved with Azure AI
value_claims.claim_description: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Azure AI Foundry to create 12 production apps including automated sales call auditing and customer retention analysis, projected to save 35,000 work hours.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps, including automated sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services process automation. These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The work hour savings are directly attributed to the 12 production apps created using Azure AI Foundry.

value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projects 25% productivity boost with Azure AI apps
value_claims.claim_description: EchoStar Hughes division's 12 production apps built with Azure AI Foundry are projected to boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps, including automated sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services process automation. These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The productivity boost is directly attributed to the 12 production apps created using Azure AI Foundry.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW processes media inquiries 50% faster with Edison AI platform
value_claims.claim_description: BKW developed Edison platform using Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services. Within two months, media inquiries were processed 50% faster.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 50% faster processing of media inquiries is directly attributed to the Edison platform built with Azure AI services.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW achieves 8% staff adoption of Edison AI platform within two months
value_claims.claim_description: Within two months of Edison platform roll-out, 8% of BKW staff were actively using the AI platform built with Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 8% staff adoption rate is directly attributed to the Edison platform deployment.

value_claims.claim_title: Ma'aden saves 2,200 hours monthly with Microsoft 365 Copilot

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduces code writing time from 8 hours to 2 hours
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. Writing code now takes two hours instead of eight.
value_claims.source_quote: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. As a result, writing code now takes two hours instead of eight, chatbots launch in 10 days instead of three months, and presentations are prepared in 45 minutes instead of six hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The reduction in code writing time from 8 to 2 hours is directly attributed to Microsoft 365 Copilot adoption.
